item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)

item.description: :) Thanks, Denis and Andy. I think this one was even better than the last two in Chicago. Awesome to see the speakers, team, venue and attendance growing the event!

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
I guess you are finally done with the gardening hey? Was a little quiet here ….

Just kidding, this is some good advice you are giving here and I love what you are doing for the SQL community
